wiki.content:
'Need to tell you this' ......a brilliant Lovers roots reggae track from a talented Artist from the 2009 album  In Transit, Ziggi was born Ricardo Blidgen  in 1981 in Rotterdam Netherlands from a Dutch Mother and Carribean Father (St Eustatius)  He has recorded with well known Artists such as Anthony B, His musical diversity and approach is inspiring and uplifting, Looking forward to hearing much more from this Artist.........Hes gonna be HUGE
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: Need To Tell You This
comments: PLEASE DON'T READ THIS. YOU WILL BE KISSED ON THE NEAREST POSSIBLE FRIDAY BY THE LOVE OF YOUR LIFE.TOMORROW WILL BE THE BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE. NOW YOU'VE STARTED READING THIS. DON'T STOP. THIS IS SO FREAKY. 1. say your name 10 times 2. say your mom's name 5 times 3. say your crushes name 3 times 4. paste this to 4 other songs. if you do this, your crush will kiss you on the nearest Friday. but if you read this and do not paste this, then you will have very bad luck. SEND THIS TO 5 SONGS IN 143 MINUTES. WHEN YOU'RE DONE PRESS F6 AND YOUR CRUSH'S NAME WILL APPEAR IN BIG LETTERS ON THE SCREEN. THIS IS SO FREAKY BECAUSE IT ACTUALLY WORK
It's the iLove Riddim by Rootdown Records.
great album. Check out his new stuff thtst out.
perfect!! great track!! missing u likecrazy
girl, i really need to tell you this...........nvm just listen to this song
anyone remember the riddem this tracks on?
wow. i can really relate to these lyrics. ziggi speaks the truth.
